```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
anscombe
```

```{r}
ansc <- 
  bind_cols(
    anscombe %>% 
      select(matches("x")) %>% 
      gather(dataset, "x"),
    anscombe %>% 
      select(matches("y")) %>% 
      gather(key, "y")
  ) %>% 
  select(-key) %>% 
  mutate(dataset = gsub("x", "", dataset)) %>% 
  as_tibble()

ansc
```


```{r}
ansc %>% 
  group_by(dataset) %>% 
  summarize(
    mean_x = mean(x),
    stdev_x = sd(x),
    mean_y = mean(y),
    stdev_y=sd(y)
  )
```

```{r}
ansc %>%  ggplot(aes(x, y, color = dataset)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~dataset, ncol = 2)
```
